item.title: Pwgen
item.description: View On Github pwgen.rb A better pwgeneration / file checksuming tool that uses the algorithm discussed in XKCD 936 to create highly secure and memorable passwords. When generating passwords, it allows to specify the strength of the password in bits. Additionally, it can be used to generate multiple passwords for different accounts/usecases from the same master password, to compare files by means of their fingerprint and to memorize fingerprints of arbitrary files (e.
